name: Alec Bradley - Bespoke - Churchill
additionalNotes: The Alec Bradley Bespoke is a medium-strength, Nicaraguan puro that uses the finest blends from Nicaragua’s top tobacco producing regions. The Bespoke is expertly hand crafted at the world-famous Plasencia Cigars factory in Nicaragua. According to their website, the Alec Bradley Bespoke is “like a fine handmade suit.” Alec Bradley Cigars is committed to creating cigars that provide a memorable smoking experience.
